Body:
ql.set_option('log_level', 'LOG_NOTHING')
with self.assertRaises(Exception) as cm:
    ql.set_option('optimize', 'nope')
self.assertEqual(str(cm.exception),
    'Error parsing options. The value nope is not an allowed value for --optimize !'
    )
with self.assertRaises(Exception) as cm:
    ql.set_option('scheduler', 'best')
self.assertEqual(str(cm.exception),
    'Error parsing options. The value best is not an allowed value for --scheduler !'
    )
